text: The 2021 season was the Indianapolis Colts' 69th season in the National Football League and their fourth season under head coach Frank Reich. ==Draft== 2021 Indianapolis Colts Draft Round Selection Player Position College 1 21 Kwity Paye DE Michigan 2 54 Dayo Odeyingbo DE Vanderbilt 4 127 Kylen Granson TE SMU 5 165 Shawn Davis S Florida 6 206 Sam Ehlinger QB Texas 7 229 Michael Strachan WR Charleston 248 Will Fries OG Penn State ==Regular season== ===Schedule=== The Colts' 2021 schedule was announced on May 12.
